channel.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer partition template. Partition templates group 1 or more partition configurations that can be used to predefine how a hard drive’s partitions will be configured. Local accountId A partition template's owner. The [[SoftLayer_Account|Account]] that a template was created by. Type: integer description A partition template's description. Type: string
